**Government Tender Announcement: Procurement Specialists**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029379
**Solicitation Number:** 202204486

**Publication Date:** March 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Objective**
------------

The objective of this procurement is to acquire the services of experienced procurement specialists to support the Contracting and Procurement Unit (CPU) and various branches and groups throughout the department in developing statements of work (SOW) and evaluation criteria.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The successful contractor will provide senior, intermediate, and junior procurement specialists to support the CPU and branches on an as-and-when-requested basis. The services will be divided into three streams:

1.  **Operational Support**: Provide support to the CPU in delivering its mandate.
2.  **Client Support**: Assist branches in identifying and developing procurement requirements.
3.  **Policy Support**: Develop procurement policies, tools, and training.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

The successful contractor must meet the security requirements outlined in the Common Security Requirements Checklist (SRCL #19).

**Contract Period**
------------------

The contract will be for a period of up to April 30, 2025, inclusive. The contractor grants an irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to one additional two-year period under the same conditions.

**Eligible Companies**
----------------------

The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   Accenture
*   Adirondack Information Management Inc. (AIM)
*   Altis Human Resources
*   Contract Community Inc.
*   Deloitte Inc.
*   KPMG
*   Lumina IT Inc.
*   Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
*   QMR Staffing Solutions
*   The Right Door Consulting & Solutions

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact:

*   Emilie Dagenais
*   contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca

**Method of Supply**
-------------------

The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. For more information, please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. 400 words.
